title: Slow cooker sausage and vegetable casserole
ingredients: ['6 to 8 of your favourite sausages (Lincolnshire are mine)', '1 onion, minced', '3 garlic cloves, minced or crushed', '2 sticks celery, diced', '2 peppers, mixed colours, seeded and diced', '200g mushrooms, sliced', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 (400g) tin red kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 beef stock cube', 'salt and pepper to taste', '100ml red wine', '1 tablespoon cornflour (optional)']
